name: Mexican Salsa Bites
description: A Mexican twist on the classic bruschetta. Perfect for a Mexican fiesta or potluck.
preparation: Preheat oven to broil. Lay baguette slices on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner, and lightly spray with olive oil. Broil 2 minutes per side, or until golden.
Spoon 1 tbsp onto baguette slices and top with Monterey Jack cheese.

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
